sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>bow</radical> radical and the <kanji>bow</kanji> kanji are exactly the same!
meaningInfo: Make sure you know those radicals!
readingMnemonic: You have a <kanji>bow</kanji> in one hand and in the other... a <reading>cu</reading>cumber (<ja>きゅう</ja>). You're going to shoot this cucumber with this bow into the salad you're making. Many people don't know this, but this makes your cucumbers taste better.
readingInfo: Imagine fitting a cucumber into the string of your bow. Imagine the smell of it as you draw the string back. Mm, take a quick bite, then let it loose.
